dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cicilline (for himself and Mr. Conyers) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To repeal the Congressional Review Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Sunset the CRA and Restore American Protection Act of 2017 or the SCRAP Act.

subsection.text: Chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, is repealed.
The table of chapters for part I of title 5, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to chapter 8.

paragraph.header: Family Smoking Prevention and Tobacco Control Act
paragraph.text: Section 102(a) of the Family Smoking Prevention and Tobacco Control Act (21 U.S.C. 387a–1(a)) is amended by striking paragraph (7).
Section 642 of the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 (7 U.S.C. 519a) is amended by striking subsection (c).

paragraph.header: Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002
paragraph.text: Section 1601(c) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act (7 U.S.C. 7991(c)) is amended by striking paragraph (3).

paragraph.header: Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008
paragraph.text: Section 1601(c) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 8781(c)) is amended—
Section 1601(c) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9091(c)) is amended by striking paragraph (3).
Section 1246 of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3846) is amended by striking subsection (c).

paragraph.header: Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1974
paragraph.text: Section 12 of the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1974 (42 U.S.C. 5911) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking (a) The President and inserting The President; and

paragraph.header: Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965
paragraph.text: Section 1601(e) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 6571(e)) is amended by striking or chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code (commonly known as the Congressional Review Act).
Section 401(f)(4) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 281(f)(4)) is amended by striking the second sentence.
Section 205 of the Credit Union Membership Access Act (12 U.S.C. 1759 note) is repealed.

paragraph.header: Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003
paragraph.text: Section 303(i) of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 (42 U.S.C. 1395u note) is amended—

paragraph.header: Tax and Trade Relief Extension Act of 1998
paragraph.text: Section 5101(i)(1) of the Tax and Trade Relief Extension Act of 1998 (42 U.S.C. 1395x note) is amended by striking (without regard to chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code).
the term covered rule means a rule for which a joint resolution of disapproval was enacted under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, before the date of enactment of this Act; and
the term Federal agency has the meaning given the term agency in section 551(1) of title 5, United States Code.

subsection.text: A Federal agency may reinstate a covered rule by publishing the covered rule in the Federal Register during the 1-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act.

After the end of the 1-year period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act, a Federal agency may reinstate a covered rule using the rule making procedures described in section 553 of title 5, United States Code.
